name: The Mainstay

reviews.title: Sheer elegance
reviews.text: Wow....I've recently stayed in 4* hotels in Barcelona, Paris and Rome, all very nice but no better than this lovely B&B run by a delightful couple. As we arrived we were greeted with a warm smile from our hosts Peter and Julie. They were both attentive, but not overbearing at all, and very professional and enthusiastic yet remained very friendly to your every need. Woody, the resident dog was an absolute delight and extremely well behaved.

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.text: We were upgraded to the room on the top floor, which was in a word, exquisite. Everything was top quality, from the soft furnishings to the amazing en-suite, which had everything that could be needed in a bathroom, even down to individual nail files and cotton buds!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room itself reflected the couples sumptuous taste, with a beautiful leather bed and wonderful armchairs around a table with a very classy noughts and crosses set on. There really was nothing missing, the attention to detail is amazing.
reviews.title: A perfect B&B - Just what we needed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was served in a lovely sunny dining room, with French doors leading to the patio area...... A wonderful selection of juices, cereal, fresh fruit, yogurt, all presented beautifully. We were given a choice of what to eat for our main breakfast....full English (to your requirements), smoked salmon and scrambled eggs or mackerel. My partner and I both opted for the full English, which was absolutely faultless. All washed down with a cafetiere of fresh coffee and finished with a selection of toast.
reviews.title: Hidden little gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only fault that we had were that we were only able to stay one night, but will definitely return for a longer break, hopefully later in the year.
reviews.title: Superb
Delightful
reviews.text: Stayed for two nights over the weekend. Had a great time in Whitby and the mainstay added to the occasion. Brilliant recommendations for dinner in the evenings and lunch. The room was really nice and a huge, comfy bed was greatly appreciated after roaming the beaches. The hosts were friendly, helpful and chatty. Me and my girlfriend really enjoyed the relaxing breakfasts especially sitting in glorious sunshine looking out onto the garden. The food was excellent and they were very flexible. I would defintately recommend staying here and I will hopefully be returning soon. Thanks for a great weekend!!

Spent three great nights in the suite here at the beginning of April and thoroughly enjoyed it. The facilities far exceed many 5 star hotels in which we have stayed, with the added bonus of Julie and Peter (and the wonderful Woody) who treat you as friends rather than people staying in their house. Breakfasts are phenomenal with a great choice, all individually cooked and, when you want to eat out or visit local beauty spots, Julie and Peter will put you on the right track.
reviews.title: Everything It Says on the Tin and More

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Should we be back in the area we would have no hesitation in returning to The Mainstay.
reviews.title: Gem of whitby!
Don't read any more reviews, just book it!
reviews.text: We visited Mainstay for one night for my birthday after recommendation from my sister and bro-in-law after they stayed earlier this year.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well....we were not disapointed!
reviews.title: Simply Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I highly recommend this B&B. We have stayed in a lot of B&B's in the UK and this is definitely 5 stars. The only reason that it is not number 1 on trip advisor is that it is only new to the area.
reviews.title: Perfect place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything is spotlessly clean. Beautiful bedlinen with a comfortable bed. Our room was also serviced daily (even the bath mat was changed on a daily basis). Breakfast was great too.
reviews.title: Outstanding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is almost a near flat short walk to the centre of town. Car parking space at the rear of the building is a bonus. Julie and Peter are friendly, helpful and wonderful hosts.
reviews.title: Lovely Place!

reviews.text: I can't really add anything that hasn't been said already but I can confirm all of it is true! Great location, parking, attentive and knowledgeable hosts, fantastic food, spotlessly clean, very modern with designer pieces, gorgeously comfortable beds - it was like sleeping in a giant cloud - just a lovely, lovely place, I can highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Gem of a place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A wonderful place - as the other reviews have said, this is a fabulous bandb - the owners are lovely; the rooms are spotless; the breakfasts delightful. We were especially pleased with the effort they went to to ensure my husband's vegetarianism was catered for. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.title: Fabulous Mini Break in Whitby

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at The Mainstay for 2 nights, 22nd and 23rd February last. Well where to start.
reviews.title: 100% Perfect - Dont bother looking anywhere else!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely stunning place. From first stepping into this B&B you know you are in for a treat. The house is fantastic, beautifully decorated and to a high spec. Julie and Peter were so so friendly (and not forgetting Woody the dog!!) and were very attentive but not in an overbearing way. Peter helped us with our bags to our room (Room 2 on the first floor) and wow was I stunned when I saw the room. As the pictures hopefully reflect, it is stunning. I wish I could have transported the room and en-suite into my own home because it was glorious.
reviews.title: Our Fantastic Three Night Stay in Sheer Luxury!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Mainstay is situated very close to the town centre with its own parking which is a massive massive bonus in Whitby as there is literally no where to park. Julie and Peter obviously have great knowledge of the area and were happy to share this with you by recommending places to visit and restaurants to eat in. We had a fantastic 2 night stay and wouldnt bother looking anywhere else when we are next in Whitby.
reviews.title: Absolute Gem

reviews.text: The breakfast room and choice of food was amazing. There was a wonderful and wide selection of pastries, fresh fruit and yogurt, cereals, jams, honey and of course a hot cooked breakfast. The presentation is stunning and so very very fresh and clean. The choice of hot cooked breakfast on Saturay morning was a choice of Peat Smoked Salmon which I had with scrambeld egg and vine tomatoes, Mackerel which my husband had with a poached egg and vine tomatoes or there was a full english breakfast and lots and lots of toast. I absolutely love my food and I cannot say how delicious it all was. On Sunday my husband had the full English which he said was amazing also.
reviews.title: 100% Quality Accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot praise the Mainstay or the hosts Julie and Peter enough. I just dont know what they could do to improve either the B&B itself or the food because it was perfection, it truely was.
reviews.title: What more can be said ...???

description: The Mainstay Luxury Boutique Bed and Breakfast, located in Whitby's town centre, offering free car parking, with all of Whitby's main attractions right on our door step.Newly refurbished regency townhouse with beautiful individually designed rooms, contemporary travertine en-suite facilities with spacious showers, flat screen LED television, WIFI, tea and coffee facilities, hairdryer and luxury complimentary toiletries.We offer a high standard of accommodation at affordable prices, with an atmosphere which is friendly and relaxed in which you can enjoy your stay with us.
